0011010100001100 0011011110010101 0 -> sum: 0110110010100001, cout: 0
0011101111100101 1111100111000011 0 -> sum: 0011010110101000, cout: 1
1010011100100111 0100001110111010 1 -> sum: 1110101011100010, cout: 0
0100111101110111 1010000110010101 1 -> sum: 1111000100001101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
